channel.title: [562] 'connecting to update server' [562]
channel.description:
I did EVERYTHING I SAW SUPPOSED TO. I port-forwarded, changed the IP, changed the JDK, etc.
EVERYTHING works on it, but when i run the client, it stays at 'connecting to update server', then in a couple minutes, it comes up with an error: error_game_js5connect
anyone know how to fix? help the newb pl0x^^
[no spam please, don't tell me i'm a noob either, i already know.]

item.title: [562] 'connecting to update server' [562]
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
@kryst-scape wrote:

Thank you sir for the help, i’m 100% sure I port-forwarded correctly, so i’ll go check the other thing.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] 'connecting to update server' [562]
item.dc:creator: @zRoflak zRoflak
item.description:
@zRoflak wrote:

one of two problems.
either you didnt change the ip correctly.
-for a 562 you would change ips by going to src in the client, then editing applet_sub1.java and changing the ip, then you would go to client.java and change the ip there. make sure both saved, then compile the client.

or the other problem could be that you didnt portfoward correctly.

Read full topic
